short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RSS feed URLs for Apple Podcasts (iTunes) podcasts can be found here and added to your favorite podcast player easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Podcast RSS Feed Finder enables you to find RSS feed URLs for podcasts on Apple Podcasts (iTunes) and add them to your favorite podcast player easily.

Key Features:
🔍 Automatic Detection: Visit any podcast's page on Apple Podcasts, and the extension will automatically detect the podcast ID and fetch the RSS feed URL.
🎧 Easy Access: With just one click, view the RSS feed URL and detailed podcast information, ensuring you never miss an episode.
🌐 Multi-Platform Support: Direct links to listen to podcasts on popular platforms (podcast player) like Spotify, Podcast Addict, Stitcher, TuneIn, Pocket Casts, Overcast, Castbox, Amazon Music, AntennaPod, iHeartRadio and more
💡 User-Friendly Interface: Clean, intuitive design provides all the necessary information at a glance.
⚡ Quick Installation: Lightweight and easy to install, getting you started in seconds.

How does Podcast RSS Feed Finder work?
🚀 Effortless Subscription: Automatically find and subscribe to podcasts without the hassle of manually searching for RSS feeds.
🔗 Cross-Platform Convenience: Access your favorite podcasts on various platforms with the direct links provided within the extension.
⏱️ Time-Saving: Streamline your podcast listening experience by quickly obtaining feed URLs and additional podcast details.
🔍 Enhanced Discoverability: Ensure you can subscribe to any podcast from Apple Podcasts (iTunes) on your chosen podcast player, even if it doesn't directly support Apple Podcasts links.

Enhance your podcast listening experience today with the Podcast RSS Feed Finder! 🎉
